title: Night-time city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A red car drives down a city street at night with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The red car is driving down a city street at night. There are tall buildings on both sides of the street. The road is wet and there are several parked cars on the side of the road. The traffic light is red and there is a pedestrian crossing the street. The weather is clear and the visibility is good.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a very slow speed because there are multiple braking events in this clip. The driver is being cautious and following the traffic rules. The red traffic light and the pedestrian crossing the street are the main reasons for the braking events. The driver is also being careful because the road is wet and there are parked cars on the side of the road. The driver is planning to stop at the next intersection because there is a possibility of merging traffic.
